entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
